title: Three members of same family hit by train on level crossing
body_lines: Three members of the same family who were travelling in a vehicle have been hit by a train in the area of Kodikamam in Jaffna.
According to reports, one of two sons died in the fatal accident, while the other son and the father sustained injuries.
The train had collided with the vehicle that attempted to cross the railway line had attempted to cross the railway line in a careless manner.
